mapper.select: SELECT t1.store_id, t1.in_total, t1.out_total, t1.outting_total, t2.id, t2.code, t2.brand_id, t2.pack_id, t2.taste_id, t2.`name`, t2.`status`, t2.price, t2.inner_price, t2.update_time, t2.create_time FROM wms_store_goods_stat t1 JOIN wms_goods t2 ON t1.goods_id = t2.id WHERE t1.store_id = #{storeId}
